scripts.deploy-beta: yarn prepare:kovan && graph deploy graphprotocol/graph-network-beta --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy-phase1: yarn prepare:rinkeby && graph deploy graphprotocol/graph-network-rinkeby --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy-testing: yarn prepare:rinkeby && graph deploy davekaj/graph-network-rinkeby-practice --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.prepare:kovan: yarn prepare:addresses:kovan && mustache ./config/generatedAddresses.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn codegen
scripts.prepare:rinkeby: yarn prepare:addresses:rinkeby && mustache ./config/generatedAddresses.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn codegen
